mapper.insert:
insert into gateway_info (gateway_id, create_time, update_time, lora_id, name, application_id, application_name, lora_application_id, scene_id, scene_name, lora_scene_id, mac_address, des, mgr_url, create_user_id, update_user_name, update_user_id, is_del, ip_address) values
(#{item.gatewayId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.loraId}, #{item.name}, #{item.applicationId}, #{item.applicationName}, #{item.loraApplicationId}, #{item.sceneId}, #{item.sceneName}, #{item.loraSceneId}, #{item.macAddress}, #{item.des}, #{item.mgrUrl}, #{item.createUserId}, #{item.updateUserName}, #{item.updateUserId}, #{item.isDel}, #{item.ipAddress})

insert into gateway_info (gateway_id, create_time, update_time, lora_id, name, application_id, application_name, lora_application_id, scene_id, scene_name, lora_scene_id, mac_address, des, mgr_url, create_user_id, update_user_name, update_user_id, is_del, ip_address) values (#{gatewayId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{loraId}, #{name}, #{applicationId},#{applicationName}, #{loraApplicationId}, #{sceneId}, #{sceneName}, #{loraSceneId}, #{macAddress}, #{des}, #{mgrUrl}, #{createUserId}, #{updateUserName}, #{updateUserId}, #{isDel}, #{ipAddress});
